alert.note: Alert for Central Chelan County; Waterville Plateau; Wenatchee Area (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 05 at 3:54AM PST until January 05 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST TODAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations up to 3 inches. * WHERE...Plain, Leavenworth, Entiat, Mansfield, Wenatchee, Number 2 Canyon, Number 1 Canyon, Waterville, Badger Mountain Road, Cashmere, Pangborn Airport, and Chelan. * WHEN...Until Noon PST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central Chelan County; Waterville Plateau; Wenatchee Area
